body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19486 (Remove unused constants `CADDR_TIME_VERSION` and `GETHEADERS_VERSION` by jnewbery)
* #19031 (Implement ADDRv2 support (part of BIP155) by vasild)
* #17785 (p2p: Unify Send and Receive protocol versions by hebasto)
* #14053 (Add address-based index (attempt 4?) by marcinja)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Concept ACK

Getting rid of `GetVersion`/`GetType` and replacing them with a compile-time checked approach would be very nice.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).
This sentence can be removed now. It's meaningless without a serialization version.

in commit "distentangle ...":

This is not compatible with the live network. When testing I get:

```
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [opencon] trying connection 188.42.33.44:18333 lastseen=1702.0hrs
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [opencon] Added connection peer=7
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [opencon] sending version (111 bytes) peer=7
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [opencon] send version message: version 70015, blocks=1746853, us=[::]:0, peer=7
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [msghand] received: reject (31 bytes) peer=7
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [msghand] Misbehaving: 188.42.33.44:18333 peer=7 (0 -> 1)
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [net] socket closed for peer=7
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [net] disconnecting peer=7
2020-07-13T16:36:11Z [net] Cleared nodestate for peer=7

in commit "user serialization ...":


Still not compatible. Now I get:

```
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [opencon] trying connection 95.183.48.89:18333 lastseen=2468.3hrs
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [opencon] Added connection peer=2
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [opencon] sending version (103 bytes) peer=2
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [opencon] send version message: version 70015, blocks=1746969, us=[::]:0, peer=2
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [msghand] received: version (102 bytes) peer=2
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [msghand] ProcessMessages(version, 102 bytes): Exception 'CDataStream::read(): end of data: iostream error' (NSt8ios_base7failureB5cxx11E) caught
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [msghand] received: verack (0 bytes) peer=2
2020-07-13T17:01:39Z [msghand] Misbehaving: 95.183.48.89:18333 peer=2 (0 -> 1)

diff_hunk:
@@ -354,28 +354,43 @@ static inline bool MayHaveUsefulAddressDB(ServiceFlags services)
     return (services & NODE_NETWORK) || (services & NODE_NETWORK_LIMITED);
 }
 
+enum class AddrSerialization {
+    DISK,
+
+    // The only time we serialize a CAddress object without nTime is in
+    // the initial VERSION messages which contain two CAddress records.
+    // At that point, the serialization version is INIT_PROTO_VERSION.
+    // After the version handshake, all ADDR messages are serialized with
+    // nTime.
+    NETWORK_NOTIME,
+    NETWORK_WITHTIME
